All playlists

The All Video Cloud playlists page lists all of the Video Cloud playlists that have been created.

Create a playlist

Manual Playlists can be created to group a series of videos where you control the order of playback.

  1. Click Create playlist.
Show me how
Details

Smart Playlists can be created to automatically group a series of videos based upon video tag.

  1. Click Create playlist.
Show me how
Details
Publish playlist
  1. Select a playlist.
  2. Click Publish and embed... Ë‡  >  Publish to web.
  3. Select a player.
  4. Click the preview link or copy the embed code.
Show me how
Details
Delete playlists
  1. Select a playlist.
  2. Click .
Search videos

To search for a series, season, episode or movie, enter search terms and press enter.

The following video fields will be searched:

  • Video id
  • Name
  • Short description
  • Long description
  • Tags
  • Reference id
  • Custom fields
Details
View playlist details
  1. Click on a playlist name to open the Playlist Details page.
